LanguageData.Miho_PlayerColony.label: Miho Psycaster
LanguageData.Miho_PlayerColonyNonMagic.label: Miho Explorers
LanguageData.Miho_Faction_Megacorp.label: Miho Satrapies
LanguageData.Miho_Faction_Megacorp.description: The forgotten empire of a giant fox company somewhere in the galaxy. The reason they're saving money is to make an offering to the being granting them intelligence.
LanguageData.Miho_Faction_Supremacist.label: Miho Supremacists
LanguageData.Miho_Faction_Supremacist.description: A group of fox soldiers with narcisstic tendencies. They claim mankind to be uncivilized and should be their pet like animals.
